urlText: St Marys Station Lift 1 between the concourse and Platform 3/4 is not available
content:
At St Marys Station Lift 1 between the concourse and Platform 3/4 is temporarily out of service.
From Monday 26 August until Monday 28 October, the lift will be closed for an upgrade.
If you require services from Platforms 3 and 4 please board a train on Platform 1 and change at Mount Druitt Station for a train towards Penrith and Emu Plains.
If you are arriving on Platforms 3 and 4 you will need to continue your journey and change at Penrith station to return on Platforms 1 and 2. 
Baggage handlers will be available to assist during busy times.
If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9851 7525.
subtitle: St Marys Station Lift 1 between the concourse and Platform 3/4 is not available

properties.smsText: St Marys Station Lift 1 between the concourse and Platform 3/4 is not available
properties.speechText:

If you require services from Platforms 3 and 4 please board a train on Platform 1 and change at Mount Druitt Station for a train towards Penrith and Emu Plains.
If you are arriving on Platforms 3 and 4 you will need to continue your journey and change at Penrith station to return on Platforms 1 and 2. 
Baggage handlers will be available to assist during busy times.
